mapper.insert: merge into email_cert C using dual on(#{email} = C.email) when matched then update set C.email_cert_no = #{emailCertNo} , C.email_cert_time = sysdate when not matched then insert(email, email_cert_no, email_cert_time) values(#{email}, #{emailCertNo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from email_cert where email = #{email} and email_cert_no = #{emailCertNo} and email_cert_time >= sysdate - 10/24/60
mapper.update: update member set grade_no = grade_no + 2 where member_no = #{memberNo}
